description: Dark-olive high-rise trousers with double pleats

core:description.text: Sophisticated dark-olive high-rise trousers featuring classic double pleats that create elegant volume through the hip and thigh. The high-waisted design elongates the silhouette while the structured pleating adds refined tailoring details. Crafted from premium cotton twill, these trousers offer both comfort and a polished professional appearance suitable for office wear or elevated casual styling.
